Description: Book of the Dead of Nu; sheet 5; red and black ink. Spell 1 continued; spell 22; spell 23; spell 25; spell 26; spell 28; spell 27; spell 30a; spell 43; spell 24; spell 31.
Curator's comments: Published: A M Moussa in Fs. Leclant, 1993, Vol 1 p480 Lucarelli, Rita. 2015. The inhabitants of the Fourteenth Hill of Spell 149 of the Book of the Dead. In Morenz, Ludwig D. and Amr El Hawary (eds). Weitergabe: Festschrift für die Ägyptologin Ursula Rößler-Köhler zum 65. Geburtstag, 275-291. Weisbaden: Harrassowitz. Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 30, 92, 99.
Published: G. Lapp, The Papyrus of Nu (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead in the British Museum 1, 1997).
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (148)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134299) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134299)
